channel.title: Allstar-pk
channel.description:
What's peoples thought on a pking server where most of the pking items are in the bank. Dragon items can be obtained by exchanging Pkpoints to Dragon items. I also added a command ::wildy to help players see if the wilderness has people in there or not. There will be custom bosses that will drop some rares at a very low ratio. Lots of afk/training spots. I am adding a duel arena with the option of using a dueling ring to teleport there. Here is a few pictures of how a player's bank would start out with...
*I also changed the requirement of Rune Plates to only be 40 Defense and not with 33 magic. This is for players who hates training magic.
[img]http://s15.postimg.org/dvqvio8nv/screenshot0.png[/img] [img]http://s15.postimg.org/h3vcvpuxn/screenshot1.png[/img] [img]http://s15.postimg.org/5g1b165sr/screenshot2.png[/img]

item.title: Allstar-pk
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:13, topic:526374”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=645116.msg4340145#msg4340145 date=1375053999]

[quote author=matty matt link=topic=645116.msg4340096#msg4340096 date=1375048459]
wat the hell facepalm your own shit! why do you think rsce wipes friends lists, banks, items, all that?? to free space.
[/quote]I have no idea if/why they would wipe it now, but there is absolutely no reason for them to. And major SQL server can easily handle their data and performance requirements.
[/quote]FYI, the database structure has been /slightly/ improved in ways to resolve these issues (this was patched a few months ago iirc), there hasn’t been any deletion from the RSCE database since Luke was running it.[/quote]I assumed as much, which is why I threw the if in there, even though matty matt acted as if it was still done.

Read full topic

wat the hell facepalm your own shit! why do you think rsce wipes friends lists, banks, items, all that?? to free space.
[/quote]I have no idea if/why they would wipe it now, but there is absolutely no reason for them to. And major SQL server can easily handle their data and performance requirements.[/quote]FYI, the database structure has been /slightly/ improved in ways to resolve these issues (this was patched a few months ago iirc), there hasn’t been any deletion from the RSCE database since Luke was running it.

item.title: Allstar-pk
item.dc:creator: @Methods Methods
item.description:
@Methods wrote:

matty matt:

in the database… wouldnt it effect if there was lots of items, unnecessary space.

Do you not have a clue what your talking about?

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar-pk
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:9, topic:526374”]wat the hell facepalm your own shit! why do you think rsce wipes friends lists, banks, items, all that?? to free space.[/quote]Because they’re fucking stupid. For a while they had all their indexing and keys completely fucked up, and had to wipe stuff constantly because of poor performance, due to their incompetence.

I have no idea if/why they would wipe it now, but there is absolutely no reason for them to. And major SQL server can easily handle their data and performance requirements.

Furthermore, the amount of storage space has nothing to do with anything. Every player can have up to 192 slots in their bank, each slot takes up some incredibly small amount. Each record has a column for the user id, the slot, the item id, and amount. By pre-populating the bank you’re not doing anything that player’s won’t do anyway.

Read full topic
